name: Replicreate
description:
Create your fighter, then replicate it to fight monsters! Use your findings from these battles to upgrade your warrior.

Naturally, as this is a jam game, it's riddled with bugs and lacks playtesting. 
There's also no save files, I might implement them if I decide to revisit this project idk

Haha, I just realized I forgot to do any sound at all. Oops.

Had to reupload bc the first file started you with 36896 coins, rather than 0.
